destinations.name: Nova Thalassa

destinations.name: Ceres Prime
destinations.description: Nestled in the heart of the asteroid belt, Ceres Prime is humanityâ€™s leading industrial outpost in space, as well as the busiest free trade zone in the Solar System. Here, the raw materials of the solar system are transformed into the building blocks of the future.

destinations.name: Heavenly Gate - Starport Asia
destinations.intro: From the Far East to the distant stars

As the most advanced interplanetary travel hub in the Eastern Hemisphere, it takes pride on serving as the launchpad for the entire Asia-Pacific community, offering cutting-edge technology, unmatched convenience, and a commitment to excellence that spans continents.
destinations.promotionalCatch: No matter if you're a space tourist from Bangkok, a lunar entrepreneur from Singapore, or a Martian pioneer from Seoul, Starport Asia is your entry point to the cosmos.
